title: Ready for Romance
description: RIGHT PLACE, WRONG BROTHERAt fourteen, Jessica Kellerman was madly in love with Evan Dryden, one of the boys next door, much to the amusement of both their families. Now, ten years later, she's about to start working for the Dryden brothers, Evan and Damian. But no one will let her forget her girlish crush, and Jessica finds it frustrating in the extreme. Because she's in love with a Dryden, all right--Damian, not Evan. And this time she knows it's not puppy love, it's the real thing.How is she supposed to convince Damian of her true feelings when he's still trying to push her toward his brother?
author: Debbie Macomber
